member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.Brightness(System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the brightness of the image in the range of values ​​from -100 to 100, where 0 is the brightness of the original image.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.Contrast(System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the contrast of the image in the range of values ​​from -100 to 100, where 0 is the contrast of the original image.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.Grayscale
member.summary: Applies a grayscale filter to the image.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.Invert
member.summary: Inverts the colors of the image.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.Sepia
member.summary: Adds a sepia tone to the image.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.Rotate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotates the image by 90, 180 and 270 degrees. Accepts as input the numerical value of the turn from the ones offered above.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.Flip(System.Int32)
member.summary: Flipping the image horizontally or vertically, where 0 is displayed horizontally, and 1 is displayed vertically.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.ParallelBrightness(System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the brightness of each image from the list in the range of values ​​from -100 to 100, where 0 is the brightness of the original image.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.ParallelContrast(System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the contrast of each image from the list in the range of values ​​from -100 to 100, where 0 is the contrast of the original image.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.ParallelGrayscale
member.summary: Applies a grayscale filter to each image in the list.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.ParallelInvert
member.summary: Inverts the colors of each image in the list.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.ParallelSepia
member.summary: Adds a sepia tone to each image in the list.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.ParallelRotate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotates each image in the list by 90, 180, and 270 degrees. Accepts as input the numerical value of the turn from the ones offered above.

member.name: M:ImageProcessor.Processing.ParallelFlip(System.Int32)
member.summary: Flipping each image from the list horizontally or vertically, where 0 is displayed horizontally and 1 is displayed vertically.
